ygData.subject: Re: PoG
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info. I plan on surging through to Level 45 in the next month or so and after that it s time to hit the Planes. Any advice on which
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. I plan on surging through to
Level 45 in the next month or so and after that it's
time to hit the Planes. <br><br>Any advice on which
direction to take? I'm brand new to Velious & don't know
which side is better to align with the Dragons or the
Giants... It seems like I'm at a turning point in my EQ
career & I havent been able to find a great source of
Ranger Specific info for levels 40 plus.<br><br>Happy
hunting<br>Tetzu - Natural Sanction<br>36 Ranger - Morell Thule
